[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@csstools/css-tokenizer](./css-tokenizer.md) &gt; [Token](./css-tokenizer.token.md) &gt; ["1"](./css-tokenizer.token._1_.md)

## Token."1" property

The token representation

**Signature:**

```typescript
1: string;
```

## Remarks

This field will be used when stringifying the token. Any stored value is assumed to be valid CSS.

You should never use this field when analyzing the token when there is a parsed value available. But you must store mutated values here.
